channel.title: [Both PI and Delta] Making any leveled monster randomly chosen to come
channel.description: I have been wondering this for a long time. How do I make a randomly generated monster and make it automatically aggressive? This is for a minigame.

item.title: [Both PI and Delta] Making any leveled monster randomly chosen to come
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

arham 4:

I have been wondering this for a long time. How do I make a randomly generated monster and make it automatically aggressive? This is for a minigame.

Ideally have the Npc ids in an array, and randomly select one of them, make it aggressive, and spawn it.

Read full topic
item.source: [Both PI and Delta] Making any leveled monster randomly chosen to come
